cab.content: ^KTOKIT' OE THE PRESIDENT OF TEE BOARD OE EDUCATION.The revision of the draft Bill for giving effect to the proposals for Educational Reform sanctioned by the Cabinet is now approaching completion.At the suggestion of the Eood Controller I have issued a Circular to all Local Education Authorities urging upon them the importance of reducing consumption of food and preventing waste, especially of bread, and suggesting that they should do all in their power to co-operate with the Local war Savings Committees in the Food Economy Campaign.With the same object in view I have made arrangements which will enable Local Education Authorities to establish Cookery Classes for adults on a large scale.J/. a . /. - J^'^s11th Kay, 1917.
